title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 184.6 - Payments to youth for work on projects
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 184.6 - Payments to youth for work on projects

State Regulations

Payments to youth for work done on projects must be based on
a specific measuring unit--hours worked or pieces produced. Sufficient
documentation (i.e., timesheets, record of pieces produced, etc.) must be
provided to the business office before profits are distributed or wages paid. All documentation must be signed by the appropriate vocational staff. Timesheets are to be completed by the youth and certified as accurate by the
appropriate supervising staff. The timesheet must show the date, hours worked, rate of pay, name of youth, contract, contract or project
number. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
